column.name: type
column.text: 映射类型: 1=外部系统-http-json 2=本地系统

column.name: send_type
column.text: 报文发送方式: 1=form_data 2=x-www-form-urlencodeed 3=raw 4=binary(需选择文件)

column.name: url
column.text: 接口地址(不带参数的地址)

column.name: category_name
column.text: 虚拟列，关联查询时使用

statements.statement:
select A.* from api_definition A where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( A.name like '%${key}%' or A.url like '%${key}%' or A.code like '%${key}%' or A.app_code like '%${key}%' or A.remark like '%${key}%' or A.category_name like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and A.id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.categoryId??> and A.category_id = ${query.categoryId} </#if>
<#if query.categoryName??> and B.name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.categoryName)}' </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.type??> and A.type = ${query.type} </#if> <#if query.sendType??> and A.send_type = ${query.sendType} </#if> <#if query.method??> and A.method = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.method)}' </#if> <#if query.url??> and A.url = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.url)}' </#if> <#if query.dataProp??> and A.data_prop = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.dataProp)}' </#if> <#if query.entityClazzRequest??> and A.entity_class_request = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.entityClazzRequest)}' </#if> <#if query.entityClazzRequest??> and A.entity_class_response = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.entityClazzRequest)}' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and A.app_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and A.remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if> </#if>
